description: Hatori Chika was http://anidb.net/ch94665 [Hatori Yuuki]`s wife and a mother of http://anidb.net/ch80778 [Chise] and Fumiki. Once a kind and loving mother, she tried to protect her daughter from the creatures drawn to her. Due to exhaustion, depression and stress, she attempted to strangle her daughter, but failed and committed suicide shortly after, seeing death as the only way out.
name: Hatori Chika
